response.overview: Jason, Allison & Rebecca are in for a magnificent musical surprise when a very special woman appears and turns their rainy afternoon into magic! Get Ready to join Joanie Bartels and friends as they take you to the Caribbean to do the Limbo Rock. Turn tube time into a splashin' poolside party and... hit the road in a car built for journeys beyond your wildest dreams! It's a spectacular combination of music and magic wrapped up in a tale the whole family will love' featuring hits from the award-winning magic series audio cassettes: Barefootin', Animal Crackers in my soup, Splish Splash, Over the Rainbow Plus much more!
response.tagline: Discovery Music Presents Joanie Bartels Simply Magic
response.title: The Rainy Day Adventure
